description: Ecosystem architecture encourages investment in desired futures. The decentralized internet's promise lies in diverse, owned spaces. Reclaiming the internet from 'Surveillance Capitalism,' requires proactive alignment. Reject rigid futures, shape alternatives. Ecosystem architecture nurtures such possibilities.
excerpt: Ecosystem architecture pushes us to invest in desired futures over expected ones. Reclaiming the decentralized internet from 'Surveillance Capitalism' demands proactive alignment and alternative futures.
